definitions.definition: ( biblical , Quranic ) A city in the Middle East which, according to the Bible and Islamic tradition, but not specifically named in the Qur'an , was destroyed by God (along with Gomorrah ) for the sins of its inhabitants .
( Oxford University slang , obsolete ) Wadham College, Oxford .

main_definition: ( biblical , Quranic ) A city in the Middle East which, according to the Bible and Islamic tradition, but not specifically named in the Qur'an , was destroyed by God (along with Gomorrah ) for the sins of its inhabitants .
secondary_definitions: ( Oxford University slang , obsolete ) Wadham College, Oxford .

definitions.definition: A city or place full of sin and vice .

main_definition: A city or place full of sin and vice .
